complexParameter.name: script
script
script
complexParameter.core:text:
def SHEET = 'NoiseActionPlanCoverageArea'
_snippets.end_Checks { registerType(SHEET)
integerCheck('FT33', 'FC32', SHEET, 'id') existsCheck('FC36', SHEET, 'inspireId_localId') existsCheck('FC38', SHEET, 'inspireId_namespace') existsCheck('FC47', SHEET, 'geometry')
uniqueCheck('TU31', SHEET, 'id')
existsCheck('FC33', SHEET, 'actionPlanIdIdentifier') uniqueCheck('TU49', SHEET, 'actionPlanIdIdentifier')
uniqueCheck('TU50', SHEET, ['inspireId_localId', 'inspireId_namespace']) }
